Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert CT/NG Control Panel as an assayed quality control material for qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae with GeneXpert CT/NG assay
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use as an external assayed positive and negative quality control to monitor performance of in vitro laboratory nucleic acid testing procedures for detection of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae with Cepheid Xpert CT/NG assay on GeneXpert System
